coreAttributes.authorTag: On the filler cap, slightly raised lettering reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Forgeworks."
coreAttributes.name: #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN LSG-9000 coom gun #ELSE arcane liquid stun gun #ENDIF
coreAttributes.namePlural: #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN LSG-9000 coom guns #ELSE arcane liquid stun guns #ENDIF
coreAttributes.description: The final word in riot control, this weapon uses a water spell to propel a stream of water to conduct arcane lightning at any target its sights. #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN The hoses and cup-like attachments give you the feeling that any liquid would do as long as there was enough of it. #ELSE You guess that it could be filled with any liquid but you don't feel silly enough to try. #ENDIF
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(bring)] out the stun gun #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN #IF npc.getBreastRawStoredMilkValue()>=150 #THEN and discretely [npc.verb(attach)] the cup attachments to [npc.her] [npc.nipplesD]. [npc.She] then [npc.verb(pull)] the sling over [npc.her] shoulder and [npc.verb(let)] out a small moan as the pumps draw [npc.her] [npc.milkD] through the hoses into the built-in tank. [#npc.setBreastStoredMilk(npc.getBreastRawStoredMilkValue()-150)] #ELSEIF npc.getPenisRawStoredCumValue()>=150 #THEN and discretely [npc.verb(slide)] the cup attachment over [npc.her] [npc.penisD]. [npc.She] then [npc.verb(pull)] the sling over [npc.her] shoulder and [npc.verb(let)] out a small groan as the pumps draw [npc.her] [npc.cumD] into the built-in tank. [#npc.setPenisStoredCum(npc.getPenisRawStoredCumValue()-150)] #ELSE and [npc.verb(allow)] the built-in tank to magically fill itself with arcane-enhanced water, since [npc.she] has no special ammunition to put in it, before pulling the sling over [npc.her] shoulder. #ENDIF #ELSE and pull the sling over [npc.her] shoulder. The arcane-enhanced water sloshes around inside as the built-in tank magically fills itself. #ENDIF
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(holster)] the taser, before putting it away.

hitDescriptions.hitText:
Aiming [npc.her] stun gun at [npc2.name], [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN #IF npc.getBreastRawStoredMilkValue()>=150 #THEN A jet of [npc.milkD] streams towards [npc2.name], followed by a crackling bolt of arcane lightning. [npc2.Name] barely has time to stare with a look of disbelief on [npc2.her] face before being hit!
[npc2.speech(What the fuck?!!)] [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(splutter)] as [npc2.she] succumbs to the effects of the lightning. [npc.Name] [npc.verb(moan)] as the pumps suck on [npc.her] [npc.nipples] for more special ammunition. [#npc.setBreastStoredMilk(npc.getBreastRawStoredMilkValue()-150)] #IF npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_HAIR) != null #THEN [##npc2.addDirtySlot(npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_HAIR).getClothingType().getSlot())] #ELSE [##npc2.addDirtySlot(IS_HEAD)][##npc2.addDirtySlot(IS_HAIR)] #ENDIF #IF npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH) != null #THEN [##npc2.addDirtySlot(npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH).getClothingType().getSlot())] #ELSE [##npc2.addDirtySlot(IS_MOUTH)] #ENDIF #IF npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_BREASTS) != null #THEN [##npc2.addDirtySlot(npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_BREASTS).getClothingType().getSlot())] #ELSE [##npc2.addDirtySlot(IS_CHEST)] #ENDIF #IF npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_MOUND) != null && npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_THIGHS) == null #THEN [##npc2.addDirtySlot(npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_MOUND).getClothingType().getSlot())] #ELSE #IF npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_MOUND) == null && npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_THIGHS) == null #THEN [##npc2.addDirtySlot(IS_GROIN)] #ENDIF #ENDIF #IF npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_THIGHS) != null #THEN [##npc2.addDirtySlot(npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_THIGHS).getClothingType().getSlot())] #ELSE [##npc2.addDirtySlot(IS_LEG)] #ENDIF #IF npc.getBreastRawStoredMilkValue()<150 #THEN The pumps hiccup a bit on empty air. [npc.Name] [npc.verb(realize)] [npc.sheHasFull] no special ammunition left. The gun automatically switches over to arcane water replenishment until [npc.she] can produce more. #ENDIF #ELSEIF npc.getPenisRawStoredCumValue()>=150 #THEN A jet of [npc.cumD] streams towards [npc2.name], followed by a crackling bolt of arcane lightning. [npc2.Name] barely has time to stare with a look of disbelief on [npc2.her] face before being hit! [npc2.speech(What the fuck?!!)] [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(splutter)] as [npc2.she] succumbs to the effects of the lightning. [npc.Name] [npc.verb(groan)] as the pumps suck on [npc.her] [npc.penis] for more special ammunition.
[npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(shudder)] as [npc.her] impromptu bukkake soaks into [npc2.her] [npc2.skinSkin]. [#npc.setPenisStoredCum(npc.getPenisRawStoredCumValue()-150)] #IF npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_HAIR) != null #THEN [##npc2.addDirtySlot(npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_HAIR).getClothingType().getSlot())] #ELSE [##npc2.addDirtySlot(IS_HEAD)][##npc2.addDirtySlot(IS_HAIR)] #ENDIF #IF npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH) != null #THEN [##npc2.addDirtySlot(npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH).getClothingType().getSlot())] #ELSE [##npc2.addDirtySlot(IS_MOUTH)] #ENDIF #IF npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_BREASTS) != null #THEN [##npc2.addDirtySlot(npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_BREASTS).getClothingType().getSlot())] #ELSE [##npc2.addDirtySlot(IS_CHEST)] #ENDIF #IF npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_MOUND) != null && npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_THIGHS) == null #THEN [##npc2.addDirtySlot(npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_MOUND).getClothingType().getSlot())] #ELSE #IF npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_MOUND) == null && npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_THIGHS) == null #THEN [##npc2.addDirtySlot(IS_GROIN)] #ENDIF #ENDIF #IF npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_THIGHS) != null #THEN [##npc2.addDirtySlot(npc2.getHighestZLayerCoverableArea(CA_THIGHS).getClothingType().getSlot())] #ELSE [##npc2.addDirtySlot(IS_LEG)] #ENDIF #IF npc.getPenisRawStoredCumValue()<150 #THEN The pumps hiccup a bit on empty air. [npc.Name] [npc.verb(realize)] [npc.sheHasFull] no special ammunition left. The gun automatically switches over to arcane water replenishment until [npc.she] can produce more. #ENDIF #ELSE A jet of water streams towards [npc2.name], followed by a crackling bolt of arcane lightning. [npc2.Name] barely has time to stare with a look of disbelief on [npc2.her] face before succumbing to the effects of the lightning! [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(shiver)] a bit as the water soaks into [npc2.her] [npc2.skinSkin]. #IF npc.getBreastRawStoredMilkValue()>=150 #THEN As if sensing the bounty stored in [npc.namePos] [npc.breastsD], the gun's pumps start pulling [npc.her] [npc.milkD] through the hoses. [npc.Name] [npc.verb(moan)] at the stimulation. #ELSE #IF npc.getPenisRawStoredCumValue()>=150 #THEN As if sensing the bounty stored in [npc.namePos] [npc.ballsD], the gun's pumps start pulling [npc.her] [npc.cumD] through the hoses. [npc.Name] [npc.verb(groan)] at the stimulation. #ENDIF #ENDIF #ENDIF #ELSE A jet of water streams towards [npc2.name], followed by a crackling bolt of arcane lightning. [npc2.Name] barely has time to stare with a look of disbelief on [npc2.her] face before succumbing to the effects of the lightning! [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(shiver)] a bit as the water soaks [npc2.her] [npc2.skinSkin]. #ENDIF #IF !npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_ARCANE_AROUSAL_LUSTFUL_DISTRACTION) #THEN [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_ARCANE_AROUSAL_LUSTFUL_DISTRACTION, 6)] [npc2.Name] is feeling the lingering effects of the arcane lightning. #ENDIF

missDescriptions.missText: Aiming [npc.her] stun gun at [npc2.name], [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN #IF npc.getBreastRawStoredMilkValue()>0 #THEN A jet of [npc.milkD] streams towards [npc2.name], but it goes wide! The [npc.milk] splashes and sparks into a useless puddle on the ground. [npc.Name] [npc.verb(moan)] as the pumps suck on [npc.her] [npc.nipples] for more special ammunition. [#npc.setBreastStoredMilk(npc.getBreastRawStoredMilkValue()-150)] #IF npc.getBreastRawStoredMilkValue()<150 #THEN The pumps hiccup a bit on empty air. [npc.Name] [npc.verb(realize)] [npc.sheHasFull] has no special ammunition left. The gun automatically switches over to arcane water replenishment until [npc.she] can produce more. #ENDIF #ELSE #IF npc.getPenisRawStoredCumValue()>0 #THEN A jet of [npc.cumD] streams towards [npc2.name], but it goes wide! The [npc.cum] splashes and sparks into a useless puddle on the ground. [npc.Name] [npc.verb(moan)] as the pumps suck on [npc.her] [npc.penis] for more special ammunition. [#npc.setPenisStoredCum(npc.getPenisRawStoredCumValue()-150)] #IF npc.getPenisRawStoredCumValue()<150 #THEN The pumps hiccup a bit on empty air. [npc.Name] [npc.verb(realize)] [npc.sheHasFull] has no special ammunition left. The gun automatically switches over to arcane water replenishment until [npc.she] can produce more. #ENDIF #ELSE A jet of water streams towards [npc2.name], but it goes wide! The water splashes and sparks into a useless puddle on the ground. #ENDIF #ENDIF #ELSE A jet of water streams towards [npc2.name], but it goes wide! The water splashes and sparks into a useless puddle on the ground. #ENDIF
